values.authorOccupation: Writer and journalist for Ms. and New York magazines[3]

values.authorQuote: The first problem for all of us, men and women, is not to learn, but to unlearn.
values.author: Gloria Steinem
values.authorOccupation: Writer and journalist for Ms. and New York magazines[3]

values.authorQuote: Every social justice movement that I know of has come out of people sitting in small groups, telling their life stories, and discovering that other people have shared similar experiences.
values.author: Gloria Steinem
values.authorOccupation: Writer and journalist for Ms. and New York magazines[3]

values.authorQuote: I don't like looking back. I'm always constantly looking forward. I'm not the one to sort of sit and cry over spilt milk. I'm too busy looking for the next cow.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: If you want to become a great chef, you have to work with great chefs. And that's exactly what I did.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: The pressure on young chefs today is far greater than ever before in terms of social skills, marketing skills, cooking skills, personality and, more importantly, delivering on the plate. So you need to be strong. Physically fit. So my chefs get weighed every time they come into the kitchen.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: Cooking is about passion, so it may look slightly temperamental in a way that it's too assertive to the naked eye.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: Kitchens are hard environments and they form incredibly strong characters.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: Cooking today is a young man's game, I don't give a bollocks what anyone says.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: We are about creating a new wave of talent. We are the Manchester United of kitchens now. Am I playing full-time in the kitchen? I am a player-coach.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: There's a bond among a kitchen staff, I think. You spend more time with your chef in the kitchen than you do with your own family.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: When you cook under pressure you trade perfection.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: Swearing is industry language. For as long as we're alive it's not going to change. You've got to be boisterous to get results.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: I am what I am. A fighter.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: The minute you start compromising for the sake of massaging somebody's ego, that's it, game over.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: When you find a guy who is powerful, a big father figure, you latch onto him immediately.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: I hid myself in food.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: As a soccer player, I wanted an FA Cup winner's medal. As an actor you want an Oscar. As a chef it's three-Michelin's stars, there's no greater than that. So pushing yourself to the extreme creates a lot of pressure and a lot of excitement, and more importantly, it shows on the plate.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: I think every chef, not just in America, but across the world, has a double-edged sword - two jackets, one that's driven, a self-confessed perfectionist, thoroughbred, hate incompetence and switch off the stove, take off the jacket and become a family man.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: They say cats have nine lives. I've had 12 already and I don't know how many more I'll have.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: Chefs are nutters. They're all self-obsessed, delicate, dainty, insecure little souls and absolute psychopaths. Every last one of them.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: I cook, I create, I'm incredibly excited by what I do, I've still got a lot to achieve.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: You don't come into cooking to get rich.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: I've had a lot of success; I've had failures, so I learn from the failure.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: I'm quite a chauvinistic person.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: It's very hard when you eat out every day for a living, and a new restaurant comes along and you haven't got that same vigour that you had 10 years ago.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: The problem with Yanks is they are wimps.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: I don't run restaurants that are out of control. We are about establishing phenomenal footholdings with talent.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: If I relaxed, if I took my foot off the gas, I would probably die.
values.author: Gordon Ramsay

values.authorQuote: All people are born alike - except Republicans and Democrats.
